author: vargasa
body:
Include a cms-bot build test that will allow reviewers to check the material budget validation plots for Tracker by merging PR on Validation/Geometry package.

* This has be built on top of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25072
* Based on https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/blob/master/run-material-budget which is not being run
title: Validation/Geometry: Include cms-bot build test for Tracker
